line.comment: * Extracted from autotrade.local script
* Gnasirator, 05.03.2012
* This is the learning trader system. I use Local Variables as EXP Levels.
* Level experience by sum formula with a steep curve
* sector traders only may level up to lvl 10, galaxy to 25, local to 20
* TODO: get format from XML file
*$Message = sprintf: fmt='Your Mk3 trader %s has reached level %s and is ready for universe trading.', [THIS], $experience, null, null, null
*send incoming message $Message to player: display it=[FALSE]
*write to player logbook $Message
* Buy Hardware
* Get tunings
* Am I able to upgrade my ship?
* Do I happen to be in a trading station
* range -1 means only look at dockedat
* TODO: (jump range AND level >= 3) OR level >= 6
* get us a jump drive
* get a Jumpdrive Quantifier
* get drones
* get saved ship hardware from cargo manager
* Only do at first start to get EC, else at lvl >= 12
* if we're getting energy cells anyway, fuel up, too!
* make sure, player won't order hundreds of drones for resale
* Feature: From LVL 18 on, trader keeps a moskito storage for missile defence
* if $moskito.needed > 0 AND $experience >= 18 AND ($level.gained OR $experience >= 20 + $b.is.ut)
* Feature: from lvl 16 on, try to upgrade shields to max

sval.val: Autotrade - Set experience, buy hardware
Extracted from autotrade.local script
Gnasirator, 05.03.2012
This is the learning trader system. I use Local Variables as EXP Levels.
Level experience by sum formula with a steep curve
sector traders only may level up to lvl 10, galaxy to 25, local to 20
TODO: get format from XML file
$Message = sprintf: fmt='Your Mk3 trader %s has reached level %s and is ready for universe trading.', [THIS], $experience, null, null, null
send incoming message $Message to player: display it=[FALSE]
write to player logbook $Message
Buy Hardware
Get tunings
Am I able to upgrade my ship?
Do I happen to be in a trading station
range -1 means only look at dockedat
TODO: (jump range AND level >= 3) OR level >= 6
get us a jump drive
get a Jumpdrive Quantifier
get drones
get saved ship hardware from cargo manager
Only do at first start to get EC, else at lvl >= 12
if we're getting energy cells anyway, fuel up, too!
make sure, player won't order hundreds of drones for resale
Feature: From LVL 18 on, trader keeps a moskito storage for missile defence
if $moskito.needed > 0 AND $experience >= 18 AND ($level.gained OR $experience >= 20 + $b.is.ut)
Feature: from lvl 16 on, try to upgrade shields to max
